lines.text: I can't stand these holier-than-thou folks. If a man's a good Republican, or a mason or an elk, that's good enough for me. Live and let live, that's my motto.
Live and let live, that's my motto.
Yes. You can hardle expect me to second that.
Gee, you got funny eyes, Mr. Brink. They make me dizzy.
I'm going away... where the woodbine twineth.
